Readout with Pandas
===================

.. code:: python

    In [1]: import pandas as pd

    In [2]: h5 = pd.HDFStore('aagandalf.JTE.KM3Sim.gseagen.elec-CC.1-5GeV-2.7E5-1bin-1.0gspec.ORCA115_9m_2016.1.root.h5')

    In [3]: h5['/reco/j_evt_j_gandalf'][:2]
